T02bsu046_u:0: Mahāsāṃghikānāṃ prātimokṣasūtram namo vai bhagavate vītarāgāya //
T02bsu046_u:3: PrMoSū(Mā)_2. taṃ prātimokṣaṃ bhavaduḥkhamokṣaṃ śruttvānudhīrāḥ sugatasya bhāṣitāṃ /
T02bsu046_u:5: PrMoSū(Mā)_3. cirasya labdhvā ratanāni trīṇi buddho yodaṃ māyikāñca śuddhāṃ /
T02bsu046_u:7: PrMoSū(Mā)_4. śīlena yukto śramaṇo tireti śīlena yukto brāhmaṇo tireti /
T02bsu046_u:8: śīlena yukto naradevapūjyo śīlena yuktasya hi prātimokṣaṃ //
T02bsu046_u:9: PrMoSū(Mā)_5. aneka buddhānumataṃ viśuddhaṃ śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhā dharaṇīvasāntaṃ /
T02bsu046_u:16: PrMoSū(Mā)_2. kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te sāvadyaśīlacaritrāḥ /
T02bsu046_u:18: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te anavadyaśīlacāritrāḥ /
T02bsu046_u:22: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ larjjinām bhinnavṛttaśīlānāṃ /
T02bsu046_u:24: PrMoSū(Mā)_4. kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te duḥśī layāya karmmāntāḥ /
T02bsu046_u:26: kāryañca poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te tedhātuke atra prajñiptāḥ /
T02bsu046_u:28: PrMoSū(Mā)_5. kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ ṣaḍindriyaṃ ye hi arakṣitaṃ nityaṃ /
T02bsu046_u:30: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ ṣaḍindriyaṃ ye hi surakṣitaṃ nityaṃ /
T02bsu046_u:32: PrMoSū(Mā)_6. kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ mātmaśīle hi ye svayaṃ vadanti /
T02bsu046_u:34: kāryañca poṣadhena teṣāṃ śīle hi nāsti gārhyaṃ /
T02bsu046_u:36: PrMoSū(Mā)_7. kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ virāgitaṃ śāstu śāsanaṃ /
T02bsu046_u:37: ye hi āsevitā ca ye hi vipattīyo pañca cāpattīḥ //
T02bsu046_u:38: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ yuktānāṃ śāsane daśabalasya /
T02bsu046_u:39: saṃbuddhasya sarvvadarśinyo maitrīpadā ye hi paricīrṇṇāḥ //
T02bsu046_u:40: PrMoSū(Mā)_8. yeṣāṃ ca vasati hṛdaye śāstā dharmmo gaṇottamo /
T02bsu046_u:41: śikṣā uddeśo samvāso saṃtoṣo śāstuno vacanam //
T02bsu046_u:42: teṣām poṣadho adya parityaktāni ye hi etāni /
T02bsu046_u:44: PrMoSū(Mā)_9. śuddhasya vai sadā hastaḥ sadā śuddhasya poṣadho /
T02bsu046_u:46: PrMoSū(Mā)_10. yāvatsūtraprātimokṣe so gaṇamadhya na bheṣyati /
T02bsu046_u:57: prativedetha-ko bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīnāṃ chandahārako nāsti cātra kaścidanupasaṃpannā nāsti uṣṇiyukto nāsti mātṛghātī nāsti pitṛghātī nāsti arhantaghātako /
T02bsu046_u:64: tadevaṃ samanvāharanta bhagavato śrāvakāṇāṃ nityaviśuddhānāṃ pariśuddhaśilānāṃ /
T02bsu046_u:65: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho adya saṃghasya cāturddaśiko vā sandhipoṣadho vā viśuddhinakṣatraṃ
T02bsu046_u:69: alpakṛtyo bhagavataḥ śrāvako saṃgho so bhavati /
T02bsu046_u:70: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho adya saṃghasya pāñcadaśiko poṣadho viśuddhinakṣatraṃ yadi saṃghasya prāptākālaṃ saṃgho imasmin pṛthivīpradeśe yavatakaṃ bhikṣusaṃghenābhigṛhītaṃ samantanavyāmamātraṃ atrāntare pāñcadaśikaṃ poṣadhaṃ kuryātprātimokṣaṃ ca sūtramuddiśeyyā, ovadikātrayājñapteḥ PrMoSū(Mā)_Einl. kariṣyate bhante saṃgho imasmin pṛthivīpradeśe yāvatakaṃ
T02bsu046_u:71: bhikṣusaṃghenābhigṛhītaṃ samantana vyāmamātramatrāntare pāñcadaśikaṃ poṣadhaṃ prātimokṣaṃ ca sūtramuddiśiṣyati /
T02bsu046_u:73: abhimukhaṃ kṣāmati jarāmaraṇaṃ kṣīyati jīvate priyaṃ hāyati saddharmmā astameti /
T02bsu046_u:84: daśānvasan sampaśyamānāstathāgatā'rhantaḥ samyak saṃbuddhāḥ // śrāvakāṇāmadhiśīlaṃ śikṣaṃ padaṃ prajñāpayanti /
T02bsu046_u:89: durmatkuṇnāṃ pudgalānānnigrahāya peśalānāñca bhikṣuṇā phāsu vihārāya /
T02bsu046_u:92: yathemaṃ syātpra vacanaṃ virakṣitikaṃ vā bhujanyaṃvivṛtaṃ suprakāśitaṃ yāvandevamanuṣyeṣviti
T02bsu046_u:97: tāṃ śṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta bhāṣiṣyāmi /
T02bsu046_u:101: kho punarāyuṣmanto pariśuddha iti vedayiṣyāmi yathā kho punarāyuṣmanto pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ pṛcchitasya bhikṣusya vyākaraṇaṃ bhavati /
T02bsu046_u:102: evameva mevaṃ rūpāye bhikṣuparyāye yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanuśrāvayiṣyati /
T02bsu046_u:103: yo punabhikṣu evaṃ rūpāye bhikṣuparyāye yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanuśrāviyamāṇo smaramāṇo santī māpattīnnāviṣkaroti
T02bsu046_u:105: saṃprajānamṛṣāvādo kho punarāyuṣmanto antarāyiko dhammo ukto bhagavatā /
T02bsu046_u:106: tasmātsmaramāṇena bhikṣuṇa āpanne viśuddhi prekṣeṇa santī āpattī āviṣkarttavyā /
T02bsu046_u:107: āviṣkṛtvā ca me phāsu bhavati no anāviṣkṛtvā /
T02bsu046_u:109: ime kho punarāyuṣmanto catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmā anvarddhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśamāgacchanti
T02bsu046_u:110: PrMoSū(Mā)_Pār.1. yo punabhikṣu bhikṣuṇā śikṣā sāmīcīsamāpanno śikṣāmāpratyākhyāya daurvvalyamanāviṣkṛtvā maithunaṃ grāmyadharmmaṃ pratiṣeveya antamaśato tiryagyonigatāyamapi sārddhamayaṃ bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavatyasaṃvāsyo na labhate bhikṣu hi sārddha saṃvāsaṃ /
T02bsu046_u:111: PrMoSū(Mā)_idaṃ bhagavatā veśālīyaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ pañcavarṣābhisaṃbuddhena hemante pakṣe pañcame divase dvādaśame pūre bhuktamuttarāmukhaniṣaṇṇena dvyarddhapauruṣāyāṃcchāyāyāṃ āyuṣmantaṃ
T02bsu046_u:112: yaśikakalandakaputramārabhya imasya ca śikṣāpadasya prajñaptirdharmo yathā praṇihitasya ca yā anuvartanatā ayamucyate anudharmo /
T02bsu046_u:113: PrMoSū(Mā)_Pār.2. yo punabhikṣū grāmādvā araṇyādvā adinnamanyātakaṃ stainyasaṃskāramādiyeya yathārūpeṇādinnādānena jāno gṛhītvā hanyemvā vadhemvā pravrājemvā hambho puruṣa corosi bālosi mūḍhosi stainyosīti vā
T02bsu046_u:114: vadem tathārūpaṃ bhikṣūradinnamādeyamāno ayame bhikṣūḥ pārājiko bhavatyasamvāsyo na labhate bhikṣū hi sārddhasaṃvāsaṃ /
T02bsu046_u:115: PrMoSū(Mā)_idaṃ bhagavatā rājagṛhe śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ ṣaḍvarṣābhisambuddhena hemante pakṣe dvitīvase navame paścādbhuktaṃ purastānmukhaniṣaṇṇena /
T02bsu046_u:116: arddhatīyapauruṣāyāṃ cchāyāyāmāyuṣmantaṃ dhanikaṃ kuṃbhakārajātiyamārabhya rājānañca śreṇīyaṃ bimbasāraṃ pāṃsukulikaṃ ca bhikṣu /
T02bsu046_u:117: imasya ca śikṣāpadasya prajñaptirdharmo yathā praṇihitasya ca yā anuvarttanatā ayamucyate anudharmo /
T02bsu046_u:118: PrMoSū(Mā)_Pār.3. yo punabhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ manuṣyavigrahaṃ jīvitād vyāparopeya śastrahārakaṃ vāsya paryeyeya maraṇāya cainaṃ samādāpeya maraṇāvaṇṇaṃ vāsya saṃvaṇṇeya hambho puruṣa kinte iminā pāpakena
T02bsu046_u:119: durjjīvitena viśjīvitena mṛtante jīvitācchreyo iti cittamalaṃ cittasaṃkalpamanekaparyāyeṇa maraṇāya cainaṃ samādāpeya maraṇavaṇṇavāsya saṃvaṇṇeya so ca puruṣo tenopakrameṇa kālaṃ kuryānnānyena ayaṃ pi bhikṣūḥ pārājiko bhavatyasaṃvāsyo na labhate bhikṣuhi sārdhasaṃvāsaṃ /
T02bsu046_u:120: idaṃ bhagavatā veśālīyaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ ṣaḍvarṣo'bhisaṃmbuddhena
T02bsu046_u:121: hemante pakṣe tṛtīye divase daśame paścād bhuktaṃ purastābhimukhāniṣaṇṇena arddhatṛtīyena pauruṣāyāṃcchāyāyāṃ sambahulāna gilānopasthāpakān bhikṣūnārabhya mṛgadaṇḍikaṃ ca parivrajakamimasya ca śikṣāpadasya prajñaptirddharmo yathā praṇihitasya ca yā anuvarttanatā ayamucyate anudharmo PrMoSū(Mā)_Pār.4. yo punabhikṣuranabhijānanuparijānannātmopanāyikamuttari manuṣya [dharmaṃ] it /
T02bsu046_u:122: ayaṃ pi bhikṣūḥ dharmmamalamāryajñānadaśanaṃ viśeṣādhiśeṣādhigama pratijāneya iti jānāmi iti paśyāmīti /
T02bsu046_u:123: so tadapareṇa samayena samanugrāhiyamāṇo, vā a[sa] manugrāhiyamāṇo vā āpanno
T02bsu046_u:126: ayaṃ pi paśyāmīti iti tucchaṃ mṛṣāvilāpamanyatrābhimānāt /
T02bsu046_u:127: ayaṃ pi bhikṣūḥ pārājiko bhavatyasaṃvāsyo na labhate bhikṣūhi sārddhaṃsaṃ [vāsaṃ] /
T02bsu046_u:128: idaṃ bhagavatā śrāvastīyaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ ṣaḍvarṣābhisaṃbuddhena hemante pakṣe catuththe divase trayodaśame pūre bhuktaṃ uttarāmu khaniṣaṇṇena arddhantha pauruṣāyāṃcchāyāyāṃ sambahulān grāmavāsikā bhikṣunārabhya ābhimānikaṃ ca bhikṣu imasya ca śikṣāpadasya prajñaptirddharmo yathāpraṇihitasya ca yā anuvarttanatā ayamucyate anudharmo /
T02bsu046_u:131: uddiṣtāḥ // kho punarāyuṣmano catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmāḥ /
T02bsu046_u:132: yeṣāṃ bhikṣuritonyatarāmāpattimāpadyetvā pārājiko bhavatyasamvāsyo na labhate hi bhikṣuhi sārddhasaṃvāsaṃ /
T02bsu046_u:133: yathāpūrvve tathā paścādyathāpaścāttathā pūrvve pārājiko bhavatyasamvāsyo na labhate bhikṣu hi [sārdhaṃ] saṃvāsaṃ /
T02bsu046_u:135: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāstṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ pariśuddhātrāyuṣmanto yasmāttūṣṇīmeva metaṃ dhārayāmi /
T02bsu046_u:136: ime punarāyuṣmanto trayodaśa saṃghātiśeṣā dharmā anvaddharmāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddheśamāgacchanti
T02bsu046_u:137: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA.1. saṃcetanikā ye śukrasya viśṛṣtīye anyatra svapnāntareṃ
T02bsu046_u:139: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA.2. yo punabhikṣu otīṇṇā vipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmeṇa
T02bsu046_u:140: sārddhaṃ kāyasaṃsaṃggaṃ samāpadyeya saṃyathīdaṃ hastagrahaṇaṃ vā veṇīgrahaṇamvā anyatarānyatarasya vā punaraṅgajātasya prāmodya śaparāsopiṇaṃ śādiyeya saṃghātiśeṣo /
T02bsu046_u:141: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA.3. yo punabhikṣu otīṇṇā viparītena cittena mātṛgrāmaṃ
T02bsu046_u:142: dusthūlāya vācāya obhāṣeya pāpikāya maithunāya saṃvītāya saṃyathīdaṃ yuvāṃ yuvāṃ yuvatīti saṃghātiśeṣo /
T02bsu046_u:143: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA.4. yo punabhikṣu otīṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmasya
T02bsu046_u:144: antike ātmikāye paricaryāye vaṇṇaṃ bhāṣeya etadagraṃ bhagini paricaryāṇāṃ yā mādṛśaṃ śramaṇaṃ śīlavantaṃ kalyāṇadharmaṃ brahmacāriṃ etena dharmeṇa upasthiheya paricareya yaduta maithunopasaṃhiteneti saṃghātiśeṣo //
T02bsu046_u:145: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA.5. yo punabhikṣuḥ saṃcaritraṃ samāpadyeya striyāye vā
T02bsu046_u:146: puruṣasyopasaṃhareya puruṣyasya vā sataṃ striyāye upasaṃhareya jāyattanena vā jārttanena vā antamasato bhikṣuṇi kāyāmapi saṃghātiśeṣo //
T02bsu046_u:147: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA.6. svayaṃ cāyikāya bhikṣuṇā kuṭī kārāpayamāṇena asvābhikātmoddeśikāṃ kuṭīkārāpayitavyā
T02bsu046_u:149: tiryaka saptāntaraṃ bhikṣu cānonābhinetavyā vastudeśanāya te hi bhikṣu hi vastu deśayitavyaṃ
T02bsu046_u:150: anārambhāṃ saparikramaṇaṃ sārambhe ce bhikṣu vastusminnaparikramaṇe svayaṃ yācikāya kuṭīṃ kārāpeyaṃ /
T02bsu046_u:152: pramāṇaṃ vā atikrameya adeśite vastusminnaparikramaṇe saṃghātiśeṣo /
T02bsu046_u:153: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA.7. mahālakaṃ bhikṣuṇā vihāraṃ [kārā] pathamāṇena sasvāmikakātmoddeśikaṃ bhikṣuvānenābhinetavyā vastudeśanāya te hi bhikṣū hi vastu deśayitavyaṃ /
T02bsu046_u:154: anārambhaḥ saparikramaṇaṃ sārambhe ce bhikṣūṃ vastusminnaparikramaṇaṃ mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpeya sasvāmikamātmoddeśikaṃ bhikṣunvā nābhineya vastudeśanā ya adeśite vastusminnaparikramaṇe
T02bsu046_u:156: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA.8. yo punabhikṣū bhikṣusya duṣto doṣātkupito anāttamano
T02bsu046_u:157: śuddhaṃ bhikṣūmanāpatikamamūlakena pārājikena dharmeṇa anudhvaṃseya appeva nāma imaṃ bhikṣūṃ brahmacaryāto cyāveyanti /
T02bsu046_u:158: so tadapareṇa samayena samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā asamanugrāhiyamāṇo vā amūlakameva tamadhikaraṇaṃ bhavati /
T02bsu046_u:159: amūlakasya ca adhikaraṇasya ca adharmo upādinno bhavati /
T02bsu046_u:162: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA.9. yo punabhikṣū bhikṣusya duṣto doṣātkupito anāttamano
T02bsu046_u:163: anyabhāgīyasyādhikaraṇasya kiñcideva lesāmātrakaṃ dharmamupādāya aparājikaṃ bhikṣūṃ parājikeṇa dharmeṇa anudhvaṃseya appeva nāma imaṃ bhikṣuṃ brahmacaryāto cyāveyanti /
T02bsu046_u:164: so tadapareṇa samayena samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā asamanugrāhiyamāṇo vā anyabhāgīyameva tamadhikaraṇaṃ bhavati /
T02bsu046_u:165: anyabhāgīyasya cādhikaraṇasya keci [deva] lesāmātrako dharmo upādinno bhavati /
T02bsu046_u:166: bhikṣu ca doṣe pratiṣṭhahati doṣādavacāmīti saṃghātiśeṣo /
T02bsu046_u:167: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA.10. yo punabhikṣuḥ samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākrameya
T02bsu046_u:169: samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya so bhikṣu bhikṣuhi evamasya vacanīyo mā āyuṣman samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākramehi /
T02bsu046_u:170: bhedana samvarttanīyamvā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭhāhi /
T02bsu046_u:171: sametta āyuṣmānsārddhaṃ saṃghena samagrohi saṃgho sahito sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeśo kṣīrodakī bhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamāno sukhaṃ ca phāsuñca viharati /
T02bsu046_u:172: evaṃ ca sa bhikṣū bhikṣū hi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ityetaṃ kuśalaṃ /
T02bsu046_u:173: so ca pratinissareya so bhikṣū bhikṣū hi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo tasya vastusya pratinissaggāya yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇo vā /
T02bsu046_u:174: taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ityetaṃ kuśalaṃ no ca pratinissareya tameva vastusamādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya saṃghātiśeṣo /
T02bsu046_u:175: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA.11. tasya kho punabhikṣusya bhikṣusahāyakā bhonti /
T02bsu046_u:176: eko vā dvau vā trayo vā sambahulā vā vagavādakā anuvattakāḥ samanuṣyāḥ saṃghabhedāya te bhikṣū tānbhikṣūnevaṃ vadeyya mā āyuṣmanto etaṃ bhikṣuṃ kiñcidvadatha /
T02bsu046_u:178: dharmmavādī caiṣo bhikṣū vinayavādī caiṣo bhikṣū asmākaṃ caiṣo bhikṣūcchandañca rūciñca samādāya pragṛhya vyavaharati /
T02bsu046_u:179: ya caitasya bhikṣūsya kṣamate ca rocate ca asmākamapi taṃ kṣamate ca rocate ca jānan caiṣo bhikṣu bhāṣate no ajānan /
T02bsu046_u:180: te bhikṣū bhikṣū hi evamasya vacanīyā māyuṣmanto evaṃ vadatha na eṣo bhikṣū dharmavādī na eṣo bhikṣū vinayavādī adharmavādī caiṣo bhikṣū avinayavādī caiṣo bhikṣū ajānan caiṣo bhikṣū bhāṣate no jānan /
T02bsu046_u:181: mā āyuṣmanto saṃghabhedaṃ rocenta saṃghasāmagrīmevāyuṣmanto rocanta /
T02bsu046_u:182: samenta āyuṣmanto sārdhaṃ saṃghena samagro hi saṃgho sahito sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeśo kṣīrodakī bhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamāno sukhaṃ ca phāsuṃ ca viharati /
T02bsu046_u:183: evañca te bhikṣu bhikṣuhi vucyamānāstamvastuṃ pratinissarea ityetaṃ kuśalaṃ no ca pratinissarea te bhikṣū bhikṣū hi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyāḥ samanubhāṣitavyāḥ /
T02bsu046_u:184: tasya vastusya pratinissaggāya yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā tamvastuṃ pratinissarea itaṃ kuśalaṃ no ca pratinissareṃsu tameva ca vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya saṃghātiśeṣo /
T02bsu046_u:185: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA.12. bhikṣuḥ kho punadūrvvacakajātīyo bhoti so uddeśaparyāpanne hi śikṣāpade hi bhikṣu hi śikṣāyāṃ sahadharmeṇa sahavinayena vucya māno ātmānamavacanīyaṃ karoti /
T02bsu046_u:187: mā māṃ āyuṣmanto kiñcidvadatha kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā /
T02bsu046_u:189: kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā viramanvāyuṣmanto mama vacanāya
T02bsu046_u:190: / so bhikṣū bhikṣū hi evamasya vacanīyo mā āyuṣmannuddeśaparyāpanne hi
T02bsu046_u:191: śikṣāpade hi bhikṣū hi śikṣāyāṃ sahadharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamāno ātmānamavacanīyaṃ karo hi vacanīyam vāyuṣmānātmānaṃ karottu bhikṣu pi āyuṣmantamvakṣanti śikṣāyāṃ sahadharmeṇa sahavina [yena] āyuṣmānapi bhikṣūnvadantu śikṣayā sahadharmeṇa sahavinayena /
T02bsu046_u:192: evaṃ samvaddhā kho punastasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyak sambuddhasya yathā yadidamasya manyasya vacanīyā anyo nyāpatti vyutthāpanīyā /
T02bsu046_u:193: evaṃ ca so bhikṣū bhikṣū hi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ityetaṃ kuśalaṃ no ca pratinissareya so bhikṣū bhikṣū hi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo tasya vastusya pratinissaggāya yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vābhivastuṃ pratinissareya ityetaṃ kuśalaṃ no ca pratinissareya tameva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya saṃghātiśeṣo /
T02bsu046_u:194: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA. bhikṣu kho punaranyataraṃ grāmamvā nagaramvā nigamamvā
T02bsu046_u:196: kuladūṣakāḥ pāpasamācārāsteṣānte pāpakāḥ samācārā dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca kulānyapi duṣtāni dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca kuladūṣakāśca punarbhavanti /
T02bsu046_u:197: pāpasamācārāḥ te bhikṣū bhikṣū hi evamasya va canīyāḥ /
T02bsu046_u:198: āyuṣmantānāṃ khalu pāpakāḥ samācārāḥ dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca kulānyapi duṣtāni dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
T02bsu046_u:199: kuladūṣakāśca punarāyuṣmantaḥ pāpasamācārāḥ prakramanvāyuṣmanto imasmādāvāsādalamvā iha vāseneti
T02bsu046_u:200: evaṃ ca te bhikṣū bhikṣū hi vucyamānāste bhikṣū tānbhikṣune vadea cchandagāmī cāyuṣmānto saṃgho doṣagāmī cāyuṣmanto saṃgho mohagāmī cāyuṣmanto saṃgho bhayagāmī cāyuṣmanto saṃgho saṃgho ca tāhi tādṛśikāhi āpattīhi /
T02bsu046_u:201: ekatyān bhikṣūn pravrājeti ekatyānbhikṣunna pravrājeti te bhikṣū bhikṣū hi evaṃmasya vacanīyāḥ
T02bsu046_u:202: mā āyuṣmanto evaṃ vada na ca bhikṣū na saṃgho cchandagāmī /
T02bsu046_u:203: na saṃgho doṣagāmī na saṃgho mohagāmī /
T02bsu046_u:205: / na ca saṃgho tāhi tādṛśikāhi āpattīhi /
T02bsu046_u:207: āyuṣmantānāmeva khalamāpakaḥ samācārā dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca kulānyapi duṣtāni dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca kuladūṣakāśca punarāyuṣmantaḥ grāmasamācārāḥ prakramanvāyuṣmanto imasmādāvāsādalamvā iha vāseneti evaṃ ca bhikṣū bhikṣū hi vucyamānābhivastupratinissarea ityetaṃ kuśalaṃ no ca pratinissarea te bhikṣū bhikṣū hi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyāstasya vastusya pratinissaggāya yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā
T02bsu046_u:208: samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissarea ityetaṃ kuśalaṃ no ca pratinissarea ime ca vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭhea saṃghātiśeṣo //
T02bsu046_u:210: paricaryāvvaṇanaṃ [[5] saṃcaritraṃ [6-7] kuṭīvihārodve cā dūtena saṃghasya ca [10] bhedāyopakrāmati tasya [11] cānuvarttakāḥ [12] durvvacako [13]
T02bsu046_u:213: dharmāstatra nava prathamāpattikāścatvāro yāvantṛtīyakā yeṣāṃ bhikṣu anyatarāmāpattimāpatitvā yāvantakaṃ jānan[prati] cchādeti tāvantakaṃ tena
T02bsu046_u:215: parivuttha parivāsena bhikṣuṇā uttariṃ ṣaḍāhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghe mānatvaṃ caritavyaṃ /
T02bsu046_u:216: ciṇṇamānatve bhikṣūḥ kṛtānudharmo āhūyana prativedyeya asyā viṃśatigaṇo bhikṣū saṃgho tatra so bhikṣu āmreyitavyo /
T02bsu046_u:217: eka bhikṣuṇāpi vodūno viṃśatigaṇo bhikṣusaṃgho taṃ bhikṣumāmreya so ca bhikṣū anābhṛto te ca bhikṣū gārhyāḥ iyamatra sāmīcī /
T02bsu046_u:218: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA tatrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ dvitīyaṃ pi
T02bsu046_u:219: āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ tṛtīyamapi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāttūṣṇīmevametaṃ dhārayāmi /
T02bsu046_u:220: PrMoSū(Mā)_Aniy.ime kho punarāyuṣmanto duve aniyatā dharmā anvarddhamāsaṃ
T02bsu046_u:222: PrMoSū(Mā)_Aniy.1. yo punabhikṣu mātugrāmeṇa sārddhaṃ praticchannāsane alaṅkarmāṇīye ekoyaraho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya tamena śraddheya vacasā upāsikā dṛṣṭvā trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ manyatarānyatareṇa dharmeṇa vādeya pārāji kena vā saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā pācattikena vā niṣadyo bhikṣuḥ pratijānāmāno trayāṇāṃ
T02bsu046_u:223: dharmāṇāmanyatarānyatareṇa dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo pārājikena vā saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā pācattikena vā yena yena vā punarasya średdeya vacasā upāsikā dṛṣṭvā dharmeṇa vadeya tena so bhikṣū dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo ayaṃ dharmo aniyato /
T02bsu046_u:225: nālaṃkarmaṇīyaṃ alaṃ kho puna mātṛgrāmaṃ dusthūlāya vācāya obhāsituṃ /
T02bsu046_u:226: pāpikāya maithunopasaṃhitāya tathārūpeca bhikṣū āsane mātṛgrāmeṇa sārddhaṃmeko ekāya raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya tamenaṃ śraddheya vacasā upāsikā dṛṣṭvādvinnāndharmāṇāṃ manyatarānyatareṇa dharmeṇa vadeya saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā // pācatti kena vā niṣadyāsbhikṣuḥ pratijānamāno dvinnāndharmāṇāmanyatarāntareṇa dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo /
T02bsu046_u:229: yena yena vā punarasya śraddheya vacasā upāsikā dṛṣṭvā dharmeṇa vadeya tena tena so bhikṣū dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo ayaṃ pi dharmo aniyato //
T02bsu046_u:231: PrMoSū(Mā)_Aniy.uddiṣtāḥ // kho punarāyuṣmanto duve aniyatā dharmā statrāyuṣmanto pracchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ dvitīyampi āyuṣmanto
T02bsu046_u:232: pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāstutīyampi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ pariśuddhāḥ atrāyuṣmanto yasmāttūṣṇīmevametaṃ dhārayāmi //
T02bsu046_u:233: ime kho punarāyuṣmanto triṃśannissargiṃka pācattikā dharmā anvarddhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśamāgacchanti /
T02bsu046_u:234: PrMoSū(Mā)_NP.1. kṛtacīvare hi bhikṣū hi uddhṛtasminkaṭhine daśāhaparamaṃ
T02bsu046_u:237: PrMoSū(Mā)_NP.2. kṛtacīvare hi bhikṣū hi uddhṛtasminkaṭhine ekarātraṃ pi cetbhikṣu trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇāṃ manyatarānyatareṇa vipravaseya anyatra saṃghasamutīye nissargika pācattikam //
T02bsu046_u:238: PrMoSū(Mā)_NP.3. kṛtacīvare bhikṣu hi uddhṛtasminkaṭhine utpadyeya bhikṣusya akālacīvaramākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā pratigṛhṇitavyaṃ pratigṛhṇītvā kṣipra meva taṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpayitavyaṃ /
T02bsu046_u:239: kārāpayato ca tasya bhikṣūsya taṃ cīvaraṃ na paripūreya māsa paramantena bhikṣuṇā taṃ cīvaraṃ nikṣipitavyaṃ /
T02bsu046_u:240: ūnasya pāripūrīye santīye pratyāśāye taduttarinnikṣipeya santīye vā a santīye vā pratyāśāye nissargika pācattikam /
T02bsu046_u:241: PrMoSū(Mā)_NP.4. yo punabhikṣūranyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye cīvaraṃ pratigṛhṇeya anyatra parivarttakena nissargika pācattikam //
T02bsu046_u:242: PrMoSū(Mā)_NP.5. yo punabhikṣuranyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye purāṇacīvaradhovāyeya vā raṃjasyeya vā ākothopeya vā nissargika pācattikam /
T02bsu046_u:243: PrMoSū(Mā)_NP.6. yo punabhikṣuranyātakaṃ gṛhapatiṃ vā gṛhapatiputraṃ vā
T02bsu046_u:247: PrMoSū(Mā)_NP.7. acchinnacīvareṇa bhikṣuṇā kṣamate anyātakaṃ gṛhapatimvā gṛhapatiputraṃ vā cīvaraṃ yācituṃ /
T02bsu046_u:248: tamenamabhibhāṣto sammato saṃbahule hi cīvare hi pravāreya tathā pravāritena bhikṣuṇā santarottaraparamaṃ cīvaraṃ sādayitavyaṃ taduttariṃ sādiyeya nissargika pācattikam //
T02bsu046_u:249: PrMoSū(Mā)_NP.8. bhikṣuṃ kho punaruddiśya anyatareṣāṃ dvinnāṃ gṛhipatikānāṃ cīvare cetāpanānyaḥ anyāni upasaṃskṛtāni bhavanti
T02bsu046_u:250: pratisaṃcetayitāni ime hi vayaṃ cīvaracetāpane hi civaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthannāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ cīvareṇācchādayiṣyāmaḥ /
T02bsu046_u:251: tatra ca bhikṣuḥ pūrvve apravārito upasaṃkramitvā vikalpamāpadyeya sādhu kho puna yūyaṃ māyuṣmanto ime hi cīvaracetāpane hi cīvaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthaṃ nāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ cīvareṇācchādetha /
T02bsu046_u:252: evaṃrūpeṇa ca ubhau pi sahitau ekena kalyāṇakāmatāmupādāya pratiniṣpanne cīvare nisarggika pācattikam //
T02bsu046_u:253: PrMoSū(Mā)_NP.9. bhikṣuṃ kho punaruddiśya anyatareṣāṃ dvinnāṃ gṛhapatikasya gṛhapatinīye ca pratyeka cīvaracetāpanāni pratisaṃskṛtāni
T02bsu046_u:254: bhavanti pratisaṃcetāpitāni ime hi vayaṃ pratyeka cīvaracetāpane hi pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthaṃ nāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ cīvareṇācchādayisyāmaḥ /
T02bsu046_u:255: tatra ca bhikṣuḥ pūrvva apravārito upasaṃkramitvā vikalpamāpadyeya sādhu kho punastamāyuṣman tvaṃ ca bhagini ime hi pratyeka cīvara cetāpanehi pratyekaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayitvā ityaṃ
T02bsu046_u:257: evaṃ rūpeṇa vā evaṃ rūpeṇa vā ubhau pi sahitau /
T02bsu046_u:258: ekena kalyāṇakāmatāmupādāya pratiniṣpanne cīvare nissargika pācattikam //
T02bsu046_u:259: PrMoSū(Mā)_NP.10. bhikṣu kho punaruddiśya anyataro rājā vā rājabhogyo vā dūtena cīvarace tāpanāni preṣeya so bhikṣustenopasaṃkramitvā taṃ bhikṣumevaṃ vadeya imāni khalvāryamuddiśya itthannāmena rājñā ca rājabhojyena vā dūtena cīvaracetāpanāni preṣitāni tāni āryo pratigṛhṇātu tena bhikṣuṇā so dūto evamasya vacanīyo na kho punarāyuṣman kṣamate bhikṣusya cīvare cetāpanāni pratigṛhṇītuṃ /
T02bsu046_u:260: cīvarantu vayaṃ pratigṛhṇāmaḥ kālena samayena kalpikaṃ dīyamānaṃ /
T02bsu046_u:261: evamukto so dūto taṃ bhikṣumeva vādayanti /
T02bsu046_u:263: ākāṃkṣāmaṇe na bhikṣuṇā santā vaiyāpṛtyaṃkaraṃ vyapadiśitavyāḥ /
T02bsu046_u:264: ārāmikā vā ete āyuṣman bhikṣuṇā vaiyāpṛtyaṃkarāye bhikṣuṇāṃ vaiyāpṛtyaṃ karonti /
T02bsu046_u:265: evamukto so dūto yena vaiyāpratyaṃkarāstenopasaṃkramitvā tanvaiyāpratyaṃkarānevaṃ vadeya sādhu kho puna yūyamāyuṣmanto vaiyāpratyaṃkarā ime hi cīvaracetāpane hi cīvaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthaṃ nāma bhikṣuṃ cīvareṇācchādetha /
T02bsu046_u:266: kālena samayena kalpikenānavadyena so ca dūto tānvaiyāpṛtyaṃkarān saṃjñāpayitvā yena so bhikṣustenopasaṃkramitvā bhikṣūmeva vadeya ye khalu āryeṇa vaiyāpṛtyaṃkarā vyapadiṣṭāste mayā saṃjñāptāstāmupasaṃkrameyāmi ācchādayiṣyanti /
T02bsu046_u:267: te cīvareṇa kālena samayena kalpikenānavadyo na ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā cīvarānvikena te vaiyāpṛtyakarāstenopasaṃkramitvā te vaiyāpṛtyaṃkarāḥ /
T02bsu046_u:269: atho āyuṣmanto bhikṣusya cīvareṇa bhisakṛta dvikkhutto trikkhutto codayanto vijñāpayanto taṃ cīvaramabhiniṣpādeya ityetatkuśalannocedabhiniṣpādeya catukkhutto pañcakhutto ṣaḍkhutto paramantena bhikṣuṇā tūṣṇīṃ bhūtena uddeśe sthātavyaṃ /
T02bsu046_u:270: catukkhutto pañcakkhutto ṣaḍkkhatto paramaṃ tūṣṇībhūto uddeśe tiṣṭhanto taṃ cīvaramabhiniṣpādeya ityetatkuśalaṃ nocedabhiniṣpādeya taṃ duttayanto vācyāyamanto vātaṃ cīvaramabhiniṣpādeya abhiniṣpanne cīvare nissargika pācattikam /
T02bsu046_u:271: no cedabhiniṣpadeya yena setāni rājñā vā rājabhogyena vā itena cīvaracetāpanāni preṣitāni
T02bsu046_u:272: tatra tena bhikṣuṇā svayaṃ vāganta vyaṃ /
T02bsu046_u:273: ito vā pratirūpo preṣayitavyo yāni kha āyuṣmanta hi itthaṃ nāmaṃ bhikṣūmuddiśya itena cīvaracetāpanāni preṣitāni na kha tāni tasya bhikṣusya kiñcidaththamkaronti /
T02bsu046_u:274: yuñjante yaḥ yathainaṃ sakaṃ dharmmā so vipraṇadhiśiṣyatīti iyamanusāmīcī /
T02bsu046_u:276: pratigraho [5] dhovanā [6] yācanā [7-8] ciravarasāntarottaraṃ dve ca [9]
T02bsu046_u:282: kārāpayamāṇenaśuddhakāṇakānāmeḍakalomānāṃ dve bhāgā ādayitavyāstṛtīyo odātikānāṃ catuttho gocarikāṇāṃ taduttarimādiyeya nissargika pācattikam /
T02bsu046_u:283: PrMoSū(Mā)_NP.13. yo punabhikṣūḥ kauśeya miśrāṇāmeḍaka lomānānnavaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeya nisargika pācattikam //
T02bsu046_u:284: PrMoSū(Mā)_NP.14. navaṃ santhataṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena prakāmaṃ ṣaḍvarṣāṇi dhārayitavyaṃ
T02bsu046_u:285: tato ca bhikṣuḥ pratyottareṇa purāṇe santhataṃ visarjjayitvā vā avisarjjayitvā vā anyannavasanthataṃ kārāpeya kalyāṇakāmatāmupādeya anyatra samutīye nissargika pācattikam /
T02bsu046_u:286: PrMoSū(Mā)_NP.15. navaṃ santhataṃ niṣīdanaṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena, tato purāṇasanthatāto samantātsugatavitastinā bhāgo ādayitavyo navasya
T02bsu046_u:287: duvvaṇṇīkaraṇātha tato ca bhikṣuranādāya navasaṃtthataṃ niṣīdanaṃ kārāpeya nisarggika pācattikam
T02bsu046_u:288: PrMoSū(Mā)_NP.16. bhikṣusya kho punaradhyānamāgge pratipannasya utpadyea eḍakalomāni ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā pratigṛhṇitavyaṃ hṇipratigṛtvā sāmaṃ
T02bsu046_u:289: triyojanaparamaṃ harttavyamante anyasmihārake taduttariṃ hāreyamante vā amante vā anyasmihārake nisargika pācattikam /
T02bsu046_u:290: PrMoSū(Mā)_NP.17. yo puna bhikṣuranyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye eḍakalomāni dhovāyeya vā raṃjāyeya vā /
T02bsu046_u:292: PrMoSū(Mā)_NP.18. yo punabhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ jātarūparajatamudgṛhṇayeya vā udgṛhṇāyeya antamasato iha nikṣipehīti vā vadeya /
T02bsu046_u:294: PrMoSū(Mā)_NP.19. yo punabhikṣuranekavidhaṃ kraya vikrayaṃ vyavahāraṃ samāpadyeya saṃyyathīdaṃ imaṃ kriṇa ito kriṇa ettaka settake krīṇāhīti vā vadeya niḥsargika pācattikam //
T02bsu046_u:302: PrMoSū(Mā)_NP.21. daśāhaparamaṃ bhikṣuṇā atirekapātraṃ dhārayitavyaṃ taduttariṃ dhāreya niḥssargika pācattikam //
T02bsu046_u:303: PrMoSū(Mā)_NP.22. yo punabhikṣū unapañcavandhanavaddhena pātreṇa anyaṃ navaṃ pātraṃ paryāyeya imātāmupādāya /
T02bsu046_u:304: tena bhikṣuṇā taṃ pātraṃ bhikṣūparyāye niḥsaritavyaṃ /
T02bsu046_u:305: yo tahi bhikṣū paryāye pātraparyanto bhavati
T02bsu046_u:307: evaṃ te āyuṣmānpātro bhārayitavyo yāvadbhedana [nissargika] pācattikam /

T02bsu046_u:448: evañca so śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣū hi vucyamāno taṃ vastu pratiniḥsareya ityetaṃ kuśalanno ca pratinissareyasto śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo tasya vastusya pratiniḥssagāya yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇo vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ityetaṃ kuśalanno ca pratiniḥsareyaḥ so śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣū hi nāśayitavyo adyadagreṇa te āyuṣman śramaṇuddeśa na caiva so bhagavānastathāgato(?)rhansamyak saṃbuddhe śāstāvyapadiśitavyo yaṃ pi ca dāni labhasi bhikṣūrhi sārdhaṃ dvirātraṃ vā trirātramvā sahagāraśayyāṃ sāyite adyadagreṇa nāsti gacchanasya cala prapalāhi /

T02bsu046_u:650: uddānam // [49] na thito [50] na niṣaṇṇo [51] uccāsana [52] upānaha [53]
T02bsu046_u:651: pādukā [54] oguṇṭhikā [55] na sanmukha [56] na osattikā [57] na pallatthikāya /
T02bsu046_u:653: PrMoSū(Mā)_Śai.58. na śastrapāṇasya agilānasya dharmadeśayiṣyāmīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /
T02bsu046_u:656: PrMoSū(Mā)_Śai.60. na daṇḍapāṇisya agilānasya dharmandeśayiṣyāmīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /

T02bsu046_u:658: PrMoSū(Mā)_Śai.62. na utpathena gacchanto pathena gacchantasya agilānasya
T02bsu046_u:660: PrMoSū(Mā)_Śai.63. na pṛṣṭhato gacchanto purato gacchantasya agilānasya

T02bsu046_u:664: PrMoSū(Mā)_Śai.65. na harite tṛṇe ucchāraṃ vā praśrāvaṃ vā kheḍḍaṃ vāsiṃhāṇaṃ vā agilāno kariṣyāmīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /

T02bsu046_u:667: PrMoSū(Mā)_Śai.67. na sthito uccāramvā praśrāvamvā agilāno kariṣyāmīti
T02bsu046_u:669: uddānam // [58-59] na śastrāyudha [60] daṇḍa [61] cchatra [62] utpatha
T02bsu046_u:677: ime kho punarāyuṣmanto sapta adhikaraṇasamathādharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśamāgacchanti
T02bsu046_u:678: PrMoSū(Mā)_AŚ.1. ye utpannotpannānāmadhikaraṇānāṃ śamathāya vyapaśamathāya sanvakṛte /
T02bsu046_u:687: uddiṣtāḥ kho punarāyuṣmanto sapta adhikaraṇasamathādharmā sūtrā yuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ /
T02bsu046_u:688: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ /
T02bsu046_u:689: tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ /
T02bsu046_u:692: dharmo anudharmaśu anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśamāgacchanti /
T02bsu046_u:696: dharmo anudharmaśu tetrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ /
T02bsu046_u:697: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ tṛtīyampi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ /
T02bsu046_u:712: etakoyaṃ punastasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyak saṃbuddhasya dharmavinayo prātimokṣasūtrāgato sūtraparyāpanno yo vā anyopi kaściddharmasya anudharmo tatra samagre hi sarvve hi sahite hi saṃmodamāne hi avivadamāne hi ekoddeśe hi kṣīrodakī kṛtehi śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamāne hi sukhañca phāsuñca viharante hi anadhyāvācāya śikṣākaraṇīyā /
T02bsu046_u:713: PrMoSū(Mā)_Schlußv.1. kṣāntiḥ paramantapo titikṣā nirvvāṇaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhāḥ /
T02bsu046_u:714: nahi pravrajitaḥ paropaghātī śravaṇo bhoti parānviheṭhayantaḥ /
T02bsu046_u:715: idamtasya bhagavato vipaścitasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasva acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam //
T02bsu046_u:716: PrMoSū(Mā)_Schlußv.2. āropavādī aparopaghātī pratimokṣe ca samvare mātrajñatā ca /
T02bsu046_u:717: bhuktismiṃ prāntañca śayanāsanaṃ adhicitte cāyogo etaṃ buddhānuśāsanaṃ //
T02bsu046_u:718: idaṃ tasya bhagavato śaikṣisya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam //
T02bsu046_u:719: PrMoSū(Mā)_Schlußv.3. adhicetasi mā pramādyate munino maunapadeṣuśikṣataḥ /
T02bsu046_u:720: śokāḥ na bhavanti tāyino upaśāntasya sadāsmṛtīmataḥ //
T02bsu046_u:721: idaṃ tasya bhagavate viśvabhuvasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyak saṃbuddhasya nirarbbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena pratimokṣaṃ subhāṣitaṃ //
T02bsu046_u:724: idantasya bhagavato krukrucchandasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyak saṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena pratimokṣaṃ subhāṣitaṃ //
T02bsu046_u:727: PrMoSū(Mā)_Schlußv.6. na pareṣāṃ vilomāni na pareṣāṃ kṛtākṛtam /
T02bsu046_u:729: idantasya bhagavato konākamunisya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena pratimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam /
T02bsu046_u:731: yasya dhyānañca prajñā ca sa vai nirvāṇasya antike //
T02bsu046_u:733: iha prajñasya bhikṣuṇo indriyaiguptiḥ saṃjñaptiḥ prātimokṣe ca saṃvaro //
T02bsu046_u:737: idaṃ tasya bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam //
T02bsu046_u:738: PrMoSū(Mā)_Schlußv.9. cakṣuṣā saṃvaraḥ sādhuḥ sādhuḥ śrotreṇa saṃvaraḥ /
T02bsu046_u:740: kāyena saṃvaraḥ sādhu manasā sādhu saṃvaraḥ /
T02bsu046_u:742: idantasya bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ śākyādhirājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyak sambuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena pratimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam /

T02bsu046_u:749: dhyānāni ca kāśyapo prakāśayati [7] saṃvaraṃ śākyamuneḥ /
